fact-31.value: Coca-Cola HBC AG and its subsidiaries (the ‘Group’ or ‘Coca-Cola HBC’ or ‘the Company’) are principally engaged in the production, sales and distribution of primarily non-alcoholic ready-to-drink beverages, under franchise from The Coca-Cola Company.

fact-32.value: The Company distributes its products in Nigeria and 27 countries in Europe

fact-33.value: a Swiss stock corporation (Aktiengesellschaft / Société Anonyme)
